summary: This is an email chain from January 6, 2020, discussing scheduling a meeting about Epstein with "all brass." The participants are coordinating a time, with a person named Geoff requesting the meeting.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Geoff is the person who would like to schedule a meeting on Epstein with all brass, as mentioned in the email chain.

events.title: Scheduling of Epstein meeting
events.description: An email chain discusses scheduling a meeting about Epstein with all brass, requested by Geoff, for a time before 3 pm on an unspecified Thursday.

keyFacts: An email dated January 6, 2020, discusses scheduling a meeting about Epstein.
The meeting is requested by a person named Geoff and is intended to include 'all brass.'
The correspondence is brief and focuses on finding a suitable time, specifically before 3 pm on a Thursday.
